id: 0 to generate a gradient to black while dilating, 1 to fill with input color

id: 99% of Material Maker's code is the awesome Godot Engine
zh: Material Maker 的 99% 的代码都是很棒的 Godot 引擎

id: A Transform node with translate maps can produce effects similar to Slope Warp and is generally faster.
zh: 带有平移贴图的 Transform 节点可以产生类似于 Slope Warp 的效果'并且通常速度更快。

id: A fill companion node that fills each area with a color taken from a color map image

id: A fill companion node that fills each area with a greyscale value that depends on its position
zh: 一个填充伴随节点'用取决于其位置的灰度值填充每个区域

id: A fill companion node that fills each area with a greyscale value that depends on its size

id: A fill companion node that fills each area with a random color

id: A fill companion node that generated an UV map that follows each filled area

id: A filter that inverts the R

id: A filter that inverts the R, G, and B channels of its input while keeping the A channel unchanged
zh: 一种滤波器，它反转其输入的 R、G 和 B 通道，同时保持 A 通道不变

id: Applies 3D textures to a rendered 3D signed distance function scene.
zh: 将 3D 纹理应用于渲染的 3D 有符号距离函数场景。

id: Applies a directional gaussian blur to its input
zh: 将定向高斯模糊应用于其输入

id: Applies a workflow map to a base material, and generates height information as well as PBR channels for the result.\nThe height input must be connected to a Create Map or Mix Maps node. The other inputs must be connected to a base material.\nThe outputs must be connected to the Mix or the Output node, or a workflow filter node.
zh: 将工作流贴图应用于基础材质，并为结果生成高度信息和 PBR 通道。\n高度输入必须连接到“创建贴图”或“混合贴图”节点。其他输入必须连接到基础材质。\n输出必须连接到 混合或 输出 节点，或者工作流过滤器节点。

id: Apply the blur filter horizontally, vertically of in both directions
zh: 水平、垂直或双向应用模糊滤镜

zh: 按照输入高度图的斜率对其输入应用模糊效果

zh: 图集用于重新映射节点'例如 CustomUV、Tiler 和 Splatter。

zh: 使用可选遮罩混合其输入

id: Both warp modes extract their direction from the height map slopes:\n- Slope warp intensity only depends on the slope\n- Distance to top warp intensity depends on the slope and the distance to the top, and can be used to create
zh: 两种扭曲模式都从高度图的斜率中提取它们的方向：\n- 斜率扭曲强度仅取决于斜率\n- 到顶部扭曲强度的距离取决于坡度和到顶部的距离，可用于创建

id: Buffers are used to find the mininum and maximum values for the input image. If the input has small details a higher resolution buffer might be needed to capture precise min and max values.\n\nNote: The output itself will not be buffered.
zh: 缓冲区用于查找输入图像的最小值和最大值。如果输入有小细节，可能需要更高分辨率的缓冲区来捕获精确的最小值和最大值。\n\n注意：输出本身不会被缓冲。

zh: 将 4 个灰度输入组合成一个 RGBA 图像

id: Combines the outputs of 2 mapped base materials (keeping the "highest" material).
zh: 组合 2 个贴图基础材质的输出(保持“最高”材质)。

id: Controls how much the noise is blurred along the x-axis
zh: 控制噪波沿 x 轴的模糊程度

id: Controls the type of interpolation used for the smoothing. 0 is linear interpolation, 1 is\n smooth interpolation
zh: 控制用于平滑的插值类型。0 为线性插值，1 为平滑插值

id: Controls whether the resulting ditance field will be tiled. Useful for patterns that extend over the texture bounds
zh: 控制是否平铺生成的距离。对于延伸超过纹理边界的图案很有用

zh: 为材质节点转换工作流映射材质(来自应用贴图或混合节点)

Defines the behavior beyond the limits or the input image:
- Clamp stretches the edges
- Repeat tiles the input
- Extend shows parts of the input that are beyond the edges

定义超出限制或输入图像的行为：
- 夹紧拉伸边缘
- 重复平铺输入

id: Places 4 input images into a single output to create an atlas of 4 images. Chaining Tile2x2 nodes can be useful to create 16 images atlases.\nAtlases are used by remapping nodes such as CustomUV, Tiler and Splatter.
zh: 将 4 个输入图像放入单个输出中以创建 4 个图像的图集。链接 Tile2x2 节点可用于创建 16 个图像贴图集。\n贴图集用于重新映射节点，例如 用户自定义UV、贴块器和 散布。

zh: 沿 Y 轴的拉伸因子

id: The tolerance used when comparing color indices
zh: 比较颜色指数时使用的容差

id: The tonality curve to which the input is remapped
zh: 输入重新映射到的色调曲线

id: The translation along the X axis
The translation along the X axis applied to the instances
zh: 沿 X 轴的平移应用于实例

id: The translation along the Y axis
The translation along the Y axis applied to the instances
zh: 沿 Y 轴的平移应用于实例

id: The translation along the Z axis
The type of shape drawn by this node
zh: 此节点绘制的形状类型

id: The value generated for black areas of the input
zh: 为输入的黑色区域生成的值

id: The value generated for white areas of the input
zh: 为输入的白色区域生成的值

id: The value of the input that separate dark and light zones of the result
zh: 分隔结果的暗区和亮区的输入值

id: The value of the selected color index
The value of the uniform greyscale image
The value used for the outlines
The width (in pixels) of the area sampled for each pixel
zh: 为每个像素采样的区域的宽度（以像素为单位）

id: The width (in tones space) of the selection area
zh: 选择区域的宽度（在色调空间中）

id: The width (in tones space) of the transition area
zh: 过渡区域的宽度（在色调空间中）

id: The width of each generated ripple
zh: 每个产生的波纹的宽度

id: The width of the capsule shape around the line
zh: 围绕线的胶囊形状的宽度

id: The width of the edge of each brick
The width of the gradient at the edges of the shape
The width of the sampled area. Setting this value higher than 1 will sample neighbouring pixels and antialias the result.
zh: 采样区域的宽度。将此值设置为高于 1 将对相邻像素进行采样并对结果进行抗锯齿处理。

id: The width of the shape around the arc
The width of the space between bricks
This node applies a 3D texture to an object using its inverse UV map.
zh: 此节点使用其逆 UV 贴图将 3D 纹理应用于对象。

id: This node generates a grid of random I Ching hexagrams.
zh: 该节点生成随机易经卦的网格。

id: Tiles several occurences of an input image while adding randomness.
zh: 在添加随机性的同时平铺输入图像的多次出现。

id: Translates its input 3D object described as a signed distance function.
zh: 平移其输入 3D 对象'描述为有符号距离函数。

id: Translates its input shape described as signed distance function
zh: 平移其输入形状'描述为有符号距离函数

id: Translates, rotates and scales its input
zh: 平移、旋转和缩放其输入

id: Unlock the random seed, so it can be modified by moving the node
zh: 解锁随机种子，因此可以通过移动节点进行修改

id: Warps its input according to a heightmap
zh: 根据高度图扭曲其输入

id: When set, a buffer is used to sample the input before the normal map filter
zh: 设置后，缓冲区用于在法线贴图过滤器之前对输入进行采样

id: Width of the transition areas between parts of the input image
zh: 输入图像各部分之间过渡区域的宽度

id: X coordinate of the center of the box
zh: 盒子中心的 X 坐标

id: X coordinate of the magnifying glass center
zh: 放大镜中心的 X 坐标

id: Y coordinate of the center of the box
zh: 盒子中心的 Y 坐标

id: Y coordinate of the magnifying glass center
Z coordinate of the center of the box
zh: 盒子中心的 Z 坐标

id: mosaic-like patterns\n\nA Transform node with translate maps can produce effects similar to Slope Warp and is generally faster.
zh: 类似马赛克的图案\n\n带有平移贴图的变换节点可以产生类似于坡度扭曲的效果，而且速度通常更快。

id: normal map and a color index map.
zh: 法线贴图和颜色索引贴图。

id: to the bounding box. \n- Square mode where the UV layout is even and centerered based on the longest axis of the bounding box.
zh: 到边界框。\n- 方形模式，其中 UV 布局是基于边界框的最长轴均匀并居中的。
